issue.head: Update DOM bindings
issue.p: The current appendix describes MathML2, it will need to be updated in later drafts.

div2.head: MathML Document Object Model IDL Binding
div2.p: The IDL binding is also available as an IDL file at http://www.w3.org/Math/DOM/mathml2/mathml-dom.idl.

div2.head: MathML Document Object Model Java Binding
div2.p: The Java bindings are also available in zipped form at http://www.w3.org/Math/DOM/mathml2/mathml-dom_java.zip.

div2.head: MathML Document Object Model ECMAScript Binding
